name: Spire Global
desc: 1) AIS Data providing 3 years of past and real-time positional data for the worlds shipping fleet. 2) Satellite collected ADS-B data for aircraft tracking 3) GPS-RO Profiles which enable more precise weather forecasting.
top_tickers: Gas, Global commodity tracking, Oil, Supplychain
sectors: Agriculture, Airlines, Energy, Financial Services, Industrials, Transportation
why_us?: Unique satellite driven data sets for trade, aviation and weather insights
advantages: Completely responsible for value chain. Satellite builder, and operator.
use_cases: Global trade awareness, predictive analytics in supply chain, insurance risk, operational optimization
